item.title: Highlights from the 2020 Fall Technology Innovation Forum [Archive]
item.description: Last month a group of inspiring and diverse group of teams celebrated their groundbreaking innovations at the Fall Technology Innovation Forum. The theme of the innovation forum was “Innovation in the Time of Coronavirus.”

item.title: BeArS@Home - 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant Awardee [ARCHIVE]
item.description: BeArS@home is a customized interactive lab project developed by the Department of Chemistry, which gives undergraduate students the ability to perform virtual chemistry experiments at home.

item.title: BLK NEWS - 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant Awardee [ARCHIVE]
item.description: What will Black public art look like during the time of a pandemic? During a time in which going out- side might disproportionately hurt the community, we want to provide our utmost support.

item.title: Data Justice-Community Justice - 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant Awardee [ARCHIVE]
item.description: The UC Berkeley Data Justice-Community Justice Initiative will enhance community-driven research in the undergraduate curriculum.

item.title: Ethnic Studies Podcast/AR - 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant Awardee [ARCHIVE]
item.description: “Scaffolding Stories/Building Communities” Ethnic Studies and Podcast/Augmented Reality in the 21st Century Campus

item.title: InsightXR - 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant Awardee [ARCHIVE]
item.description: This project, submitted by professor Luisa Caldas and Architecture, Building Science and Technology researcher Elnaz Tafrihi Bailey will fund the development of a Virtual, Augmented and Mixed Reality (VR/AR/MR) tool developed by the College of Environmental Design.

item.title: Integrative Biology - 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant Awardee [ARCHIVE]
item.description: The Department of Integrative Biology depends on students being able to participate in immersive, hands-on lab field classes in natural history.

item.title: Lucid Learning - 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant Awardee [ARCHIVE]
item.description: Lucid Learning is a tool to help students practice collaboration early in their careers.

item.title: Pearl Project - 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant Awardee [ARCHIVE]
item.description: (PEARL) Project allows students to have real and physical interaction with laboratory equipment in real time via the Internet as if they were present in the lab.

item.title: RTL AR/VR - 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant Awardee [ARCHIVE]
item.description: RTL will partner with the CTO and our AR/VR 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant awardees to develop a community of practice for AR/VR supporting instruction and research.

item.title: The Berkeley Connected Campus and the 2020 CTO Innovation Program [Archive]
item.description: Current smart and Internet of Things technologies can bridge the physical and digital campus.

item.title: VRTutor - 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant Awardee [ARCHIVE]
item.description: This project, submitted by professor Luisa Caldas and Architecture, Building Science and Technology researcher Elnaz Tafrihi Bailey will fund the development of a Virtual, Augmented and Mixed Reality (VR/AR/MR) tool developed by the College of Environmental Design.

item.title: 2020 Fall Technology Innovation Forum [Archive]
item.description: The 2020 Fall Technology Innovation Forum brought together an inspiring and diverse group of teams to share their experiences bringing new innovations to Berkeley

item.title: Advisors to the UC Berkeley 2020 CTO Technology Innovation Program [ARCHIVE]
item.description: A University can’t effectively steer a course or invent the future without a strong committed team of people. Thanks to all our collaborators and advisors, who are leading and contributing to the technology innovation program.

item.title: Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant Awardees Announced [ARCHIVE]
item.description: More than one of the faculty members we spoke with said their proposals were originally intended to address instruction during the pandemic– but thinking through the affordances of new technology led them to permanently rethink how they will teach their courses.

item.title: 2020 Student Impact Partnerships [ARCHIVE]
item.description: The CTO Technology Innovation Program is establishing partnerships with student focused programs and organizations at Berkeley that foster innovation, encourage new ways of looking at the world, and promote positive change.

item.title: Berkeley Changemaker™ Technology Innovation Grants [ARCHIVE]
item.description: Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grants (2020) provide financial incentives to bring together individual ideas and excellence from across Berkeley’s decentralized campus, fostering connections and developing institutional awareness and support to expand positive impact.

item.title: Meet the 2020 Berkeley Changemaker™ Technology Innovation Review Committee [ARCHIVE]
item.description: Submissions have closed, and the review committee is evaluating the 2020 applicants to the Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant program.

item.title: 2020 Call for Proposals Berkeley Changemaker™ Technology Innovation Grants [ARCHIVE]
item.description: We are now accepting proposals for Berkeley’s first-ever CTO Technology Innovation program. The CTO is looking to support proposals that will enhance the University’s operations, bolster its research endeavors or help transform instruction and the classroom experience.
